__e: I'm using it for an emergency, I'm moving around a lot.
His old work files, but mostly, I use it for Christmas cards and recipes.
So, this is a safe house... we use for people in protective custody.
I use it as a reminder... a reminder of him and a reminder of what I never wanted to become.
My father has taught me never to trust magic, and now I am using it to save him.
Don't you think he'd want me to use it for something I really am into?
So, I just figured, if we don't use it, we should lose it.
If we do it your way, there's a chance that she may not use it down the road.
